title: Quetzalcoatl - passage most likely excerpted from

content.question: The passage is most likely excerpted from

choices.label: an informational essay hailing the triumph of local arts over colonial interests
a research report promoting art history as a field of study
a scholarly work explaining historical developments in indigenous arts
a descriptive analysis examining the effect of geography on art

content.answer: a scholarly work explaining historical developments in indigenous arts

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
